item.title: Argo Workflow 7
item.description: Argo Workflow (7) Walk through 章节的相关特性还剩下: Kubernetes Resource https://argo-workflows.readthedocs.io/en/latest/walk-through/kubernetes-resources/ Daemon Container Sidecar Container Custom Template Variables Continuous Integration Example 下次有机会再总结. 目前学的这些够用了.
